key.name: display-gamma
key.description: The default target gamma value for the display. Common values are 1.8, 2.2 and 2.4.

key.name: display-whitepoint
key.description: The default target whitepoint in Kelvin for display calibration, with 0 meaning display native. Common values are 6500 for D65 and 5000 for D50.
